version_description:
- Fixed slowdown issues for certain devices in quests, etc.
- Added a timer to show remaining time for Medal pulls
- Added option to send party invites to players level 200 or higher
- Added support for free text entry in other languages using the system font
- Made several other adjustments and bug fixes

■UI Adjustments
- Medals used for Level Up will now be organized as stacks of up to 99 Medals.
- Various other adjustments.

■Functionality Additions/Fixes
- Added the Luck parameter to certain avatar parts.
- Added the ability for each party members to set "Lux Up Time".
- Added the ability to save up to 3 Medal decks per keyblade (this feature is unlocked after upgrading any keyblade to +20).
- The ability gauge will now reset to its pre-quest states after failing or giving up on a quest.

■Other
-Change of app icon
-Bug fixes
Fixed a crash bug that sometimes occurred during gameplay.
Fixed various issues.

-Changed app icon
-Added the new “Nova” system
-Added functions for future events
-Made adjustments to the UI
-Resolved minor issues
Fixed various issues.

- Added multiplayer feature "Union Cross"
- Added Medal traits feature
- Increased status effect limit to 7 tiers
- Edited app icon
- Edited title, title screen, and opening movie
- Added theater mode feature
- Improved UI
- Fixed various issues
-Fixed various issues.

- Union Cross (multiplayer) quests can be locked to allow only specific players to participate.
- Improvements made to Raid Boss camera and overall pace of battle.
- Auto battle feature added to Raid Bosses.
- Skill icons divided into additional types.
- Keyblade level cap increased.
- Various UI improvements made.
- Various bug fixes made.
-Fixed various issues.
-Resolved minor issues.

- Added completion percentage to the quest selection screen.
- Added completion icons for each special quest and event banner.
- Added perk filters for accessories on the Outfits screen.
- Added the MVP Award for multiplayer Union Cross quests.
- Changed the party ranking calculation method.
- Various UI tweaks.
- Bug fixes.

- Added Pet System.
- Adjusted initial Story Quests.
- UI improvements and additions.
- Bug fixes.

- Added Booster feature that temporarily boosts parameters.
- Added Mission feature.
- Added party members' login status display.
- Adjusted Raid Boss notifications.
- Added Auto-Battle feature.
- Adjusted Auto-Battle save function.
-Fixed various issues.
-Bug fixes.

- Added Lite version option.
- Added ability to use Nova Attack during Auto-Battle.
- Added higher rank Pet Tricks.
- Minor bug fixes.
-Bug fixes.

-Added PVP Mode within the Coliseum
-Added 7 star Medals
-Added Keyblade subslots
-After completing the first Story Quest in a particular questline, all following Quests in the same questline will now be unlocked
-Added ability to ‘Optimize’ equipped Medals for Story Quests and in Proud Mode
-Added more Medal filter options
-A PUSH notification will now be sent when a Lux Boost is activated
-Added support for iPhone X screen size

-The Missions screen, which was previously only viewable from the Home screen, will now be viewable from all locations.
-Changed the options of the lineup sorting feature, which is available when you tap the screen while in the Home screen.
-If the Raid Boss that you are battling is defeated by another player, your contribution will now appear in that player’s Results screen.
-Added the option to flee from Raid battles.
*Please note that the damage that was done prior to fleeing will be counted properly.
-Added the “Imitation (Unleashes the same attack as the previous or next Medal)” option to the Medal filter.
-Facebook posts will now utilize the Facebook interface.
-Edited app icon
-Other miscellaneous bug fixes.

-Added χ3 [ex tres] Mode
-Added “Community” to χ3 [ex tres] Mode
-Added “Classic Kingdom” to χ3 [ex tres] Mode
-Added “Limited-Time Challenge” to χ3 [ex tres] Mode
-Updated app icon
-Implemented various bug fixes

-Players are now able to navigate directly between χ3 [ex tres] Mode and the HOME screen
-Super Skip Tickets are now given instead of Skip Tickets as a bonus for purchasing certain Jewel packs
-Implemented various bug fixes

Log in every day and clear missions to get more than 10,000 Jewels each month!
-Added Passives.
-Added the Moogle Shop.
-Simplified the Medal fusion process.
-Added the Speed-up feature in Union Cross.
-Adjusted the subslot modifiers of Keyblades.
-Changed the app icon.
-Implemented various bug fixes.

Log in every day and clear missions to get more than 10,000 Jewels each month!
-Added [Beginner’s Guide] button to the Home screen.
-Increased visibility of Boosted and SN/SN+ Medals in Medal List.
-Up to 99 of the same Trait Medal can now stack into one slot in Medal Storage.
-Added new Filter categories in Medal List: [Trait Medals], [Can be Evolved], and [SN].
-Adjusted the [Special Attack] Sort option in Medal List.
-Huey & Dewey & Louie Medals will now appear when selecting [Optimize] in the Level Up menu.
-Adjusted the transition after a raid spawns.
-Implemented various bug fixes.

- Automating Subslots
- Button to allow Avatar Boards to be unlocked entirely
- Feature to allow for all Medals to be unequipped from a Keyblade and Subslots
- Optimize keyblade feature improved
-Implemented various bug fixes

Login and clear missions daily to earn over 10,000 Jewels each month!
-NEW Spirit Training mode!
-NEW Quest Speed-Up feature!
-An innate “Ground /Aerial Enemy DEF -60%” effect has been added to Supernova!
-Bonus rewards have been added for Jewel Box F purchases!
-Data download sizes are now displayed.
-UI improvements

-Huey & Dewey & Louie Medals will now appear when selecting [Optimize] in the Level Up menu.

-Suspended certain Facebook functions.

Log in every day and clear missions to get more than 10,000 Jewels each month!
- Various UI elements have been revamped and adjusted.

Log in every day and clear missions to get more than 10,000 Jewels each month!
-UI has been adjusted.
-The process to increase the capacity of your Medal storage has been improved upon.
-Supernova can now be used in Auto mode.
-Implemented various minor UI adjustments and bug fixes.

-Revamped certain features

Log in every day and clear missions to get more than 10,000 Jewels each month!
-A new mobile experience "DARK ROAD" has been added.

-Implemented various bug fixes

Log in every day and clear missions to get more than 10,000 Jewels each month!

■KHDR
- Added a Craft feature that lets players craft accessories with materials that they have collected.

■KHUX
- Added a feature that lets players gain BP for KHDR by playing KHUX.
- Players can now evolve Medals by spending Munny at the Moogle Shop.
- Implemented a variety of bug fixes.

-Implemented various bug fixes

-Added PVE in KHDR.
-Improved the AUTO mode in KHDR.
-Implemented various minor UI adjustments and bug fixes.
